summary.long: 1 Chronicles is a book of the Old Testament.

verses.text: Adam, Sheth, Enosh,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Kenan, Mahalaleel, Jered,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Henoch, Methuselah, Lamech,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sons of Japheth: Gomer and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Gomer: Ashchenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Javan: Elisha, and Tarshishah, Kittim, and Dodanim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sons of Ham: Cush, and Mizraim, Put, and Canaan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Cush: Seba and Havilah, and Sabta, and Raamah, and Sabtecka. And sons of Raamah: Sheba and Dedan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Cush begat Nimrod: he began to be a mighty one in the land.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Mizraim begat the Ludim, and the Anamim, and the Lehabim, and the Naphtuhim,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and the Pathrusim, and the Casluhim (from whom came out the Philistim), and the Caphtorim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Canaan begat Zidon his first born, and Heth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and the Jebusite, and the Amorite, and the Girgashite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sons of Shem: Elam and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram, and Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Meshech.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Arphaxad begat Shelah, and Shelah begat Eber.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And to Eber have been born two sons, the name of the one [is] Peleg, for in his days hath the land been divided, and the name of his brother is Joktan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Joktan begat Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Hadoram, and Uzal, and Diklah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Ebal, and Abimael, and Sheba,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab; all these [are] sons of Joktan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Shem, Arphaxad, Shelah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Eber, Peleg, Reu,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Serug, Nahor, Terah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Abram -- he [is] Abraham.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sons of Abraham: Isaac and Ishmael.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These [are] their generations: first-born of Ishmael, Nebaioth, and Kedar, and Adheel, and Mibsam,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Mishma, and Dumah, Massa, Hadad, and Tema,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Jetur, Naphish, and Kedema. These are sons of Ishmael.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Keturah, Abraham's concubine: she bare Zimran, and Jokshan, and Medan, and Midian, and Ishbak, and Shuah. And sons of Jokshan: Sheba and Dedan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Midian: Ephah and Epher, and Henoch, and Abida, and Eldaah; all these [are] sons of Keturah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Abraham begetteth Isaac. Sons of Isaac: Esau and Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sons of Esau: Eliphaz, Reuel, and Jeush, and Jaalam, and Korah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sons of Eliphaz: Teman, and Omar, Zephi, and Gatam, Kenaz, and Timna, and Amalek.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sons of Reuel: Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Seir: Lotan, and Shobal, and Zibeon, and Anah, and Dishon, and Ezar, and Dishan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Lotan: Hori and Homam, and sister of Lotan [is] Timna.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sons of Shobal: Alian, and Manahath, and Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. And sons of Zideon: Aiah and Anah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Anah: Dishon. and sons of Dishon: Amram, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Cheran.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sons of Ezer: Bilhan, and Zavan, Jakan. Sons of Dishan: Uz and Aran.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these [are] the kings who reigned in the land of Edom before the reigning of a king of the sons of Israel: Bela son of Beor, and the name of his city [is] Dinhabah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Bela dieth, and reign in his stead doth Jobab son of Zerah from Bozrali;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Jobab dieth, and reign in his stead doth Husham from the land of the Temanite;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Husham dieth, and reign in his stead doth Hadad, son of Bedad (who smiteth Midian in the field of Moab) and the name of his city [is] Avith;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Hadad dieth, and reign in his stead doth Samlah from Masrekah;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Samlah dieth, and reign in his stead doth Shaul from Rehoboth of the River;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Shaul dieth, and reign in his stead doth Baal-Hanan son of Achbor;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Baal-Hanan dieth, and reign in his stead doth Hadad, and the name of his city [is] Pai, and the name of his wife [is] Mehetabel daughter of Matred, daughter of Me-Zahab; Hadad also dieth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And chiefs of Edom are: chief Timnah, chief Aliah, chief Jetheth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: chief Aholibamah, chief Elah, chief Pinon,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: chief Kenaz, chief Teman, chief Mibzar,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: chief Magdiel, chief Iram. These [are] chiefs of Edom.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These [are] sons of Israel: Reuben, Simeon, Levi, and Judah, Issachar, and Zebulun,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Dan, Joseph, and Benjamin, Naphtali, Gad, and Asher.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sons of Judah: Er, and Onan, and Shelah, three have been born to him of a daughter of Shua the Canaanitess. And Er, first-born of Judah, is evil in the eyes of Jehovah, and He putteth him to death.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Tamar his daughter-in-law hath borne to him Pharez and Zerah. All the sons of Judah [are] five.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sons of Pharez: Hezron, and Hamul.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Zerah: Zimri, and Ethan, and Heman, and Calcol, and Dara; all of them five.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Carmi: Achar, troubler of Israel, who trespassed in the devoted thing.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Ethan: Azariah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Hezron who were born to him; Jerahmeel, and Ram, and Chelubai.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ram begat Amminadab, and Amminadab begat Nahshon, prince of the sons of Judah;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Nahshon begat Salma, and Salma begat Boaz,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Boaz begat Obed, and Obed begat Jesse;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Jesse begat his first-born Eliab, and Abinadab the second, and Shimea the third,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Nethaneel the fourth, Raddai the fifth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ozem the sixth, David the seventh,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and their sisters Zeruiah and Abigail. And sons of Zeruiah: Abishai, and Joab, and Asah-El -- three.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Abigail hath borne Amasa, and the father of Amasa [is] Jether the Ishmeelite.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Caleb son of Hezron hath begotten Azubah, Isshah, and Jerioth; and these [are] her sons: Jesher, and Shobab, and Ardon.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Azubah dieth, and Caleb taketh to him Ephrath, and she beareth to him Hur.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Hur begat Uri, and Uri begat Bezaleel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And afterwards hath Hezron gone in unto a daughter of Machir father of Gilead, and he hath taken her, and he [is] a son of sixty years, and she beareth to him Segub.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Segub begat Jair, and he hath twenty and three cities in the land of Gilead,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and he taketh Geshur and Aram, the small villages of Jair, from them, with Kenath and its small towns, sixty cities -- all these [belonged to] the sons of Machir father of Gilead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And after the death of Hezron in Caleb-Ephratah, then the wife of Hezron, Abijah, even beareth to him Asshur, father of Tekoa.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Jerahmeel, first-born of Hezron, are: the first-born Ram, and Bunah, and Oren, and Ozem, Ahijah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Jerahmeel hath another wife, and her name [is] Atarah, she [is] mother of Onam.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Ram, first-born of Jerahmeel, are Maaz, and Jamin, and Eker.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Onam are Shammai and Jada. And sons of Shammai: Nadab and Abishur.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the name of the wife of Abishur [is] Abihail, and she beareth to him Ahban and Molid.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Nadab: Seled, and Appaim; and Seled dieth without sons.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Appaim: Ishi. And sons of Ishi: Sheshan. And sons of Sheshan: Ahlai.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Jada, brother of Shammai: Jether, and Jonathan: and Jether dieth without sons.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Jonathan: Peleth, and Zaza. These were sons of Jerahmeel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Sheshan had no sons, but daughters, and Sheshan hath a servant, an Egyptian, and his name [is] Jarha,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Sheshan giveth his daughter to Jarha his servant for a wife, and she beareth to him Attai;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Attai begat Nathan, and Nathan begat Zabad,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Zabad begat Ephlal, and Ephlal begat Obed,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Obed begat Jehu,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Jehu begat Azariah, and Azariah begat Helez, and Helez begat Eleasah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Eleasah begat Sismai, and Sismai begat Shallum,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Shallum begat Jekamiah, and Jekamiah begat Elishama.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Caleb brother of Jerahmeel: Mesha his first-born, he [is] father of Ziph; and sons of Mareshah: Abi-Hebron.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Hebron: Korah, and Tappuah, and Rekem, and Shema.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shema begat Raham father of Jorkoam, and Rekem begat Shammai.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And a son of Shammai [is] Maon, and Maon [is] father of Beth-Zur.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ephah concubine of Caleb bare Haran, and Moza, and Gazez; and Haran begat Gazez.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Jahdai: Regem, and Jotham, and Geshem, and Pelet, and Ephah, and Shaaph.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The concubine of Caleb, Maachah, bare Sheber and Tirhanah;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and she beareth Shaaph father of Madmannah, Sheva father of Machbenah, and father of Gibea; and a daughter of Caleb [is] Achsa.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These were sons of Caleb son of Hur, first-born of Ephrathah: Shobal father of Kirjath-Jearim,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Salma father of Beth-Lehem, Hareph father of Beth-Gader.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And there are sons to Shobal father of Kirjath-Jearim: Haroeh, half of the Menuhothite;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and the families of Kirjath-Jearim: the Ithrite, and the Puhite, and the Shumathite, and the Mishraite: from these went out the Zareathite, and the Eshtaulite.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sons of Salma: Beth-Lehem, and the Netophathite, Atroth, Beth-Joab, and half of the Menuhothite, the Zorite;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and the families of the scribes the inhabitants of Jabez: Tirathites, Shimeathites, Suchathites. They [are] the Kenites, those coming of Hammath father of the house of Rechab.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these were sons of David, who were born to him in Hebron: the first-born Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jezreelitess; second Daniel, of Abigail the Carmelitess;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the third Absalom, son of Maachah daughter of Talmai king of Geshur; the fourth Adonijah, son of Haggith;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the fifth Shephatiah, of Abital; the sixth Ithream, of Eglah his wife.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Six have been borne to him in Hebron, and he reigneth there seven years and six months, and thirty and three years he hath reigned in Jerusalem.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these were born to him in Jerusalem: Shimea, and Shobab, and Nathan, and Solomon -- four, of Bath-Sheba daughter of Ammiel:
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: also Ibhar, and Elishama, and Eliphelet,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: All [are] sons of David, apart from sons of the concubines, and Tamar their sister.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the son of Solomon [is] Rehoboam, Abijah his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Amon his son, Josiah his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Josiah: the first-born Johanan, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, the fourth Shallum.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah his son, Zedekiah his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Jeconiah: Assir; Salathiel his son;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: also Malchiram and Pedaiah, and Shenazzar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Pedaiah: Zerubbabel, and Shimei. And sons of Zerubbabel: Meshullam, and Hananiah, and Shelomith their sister,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Hashubah, and Ohel, and Berechiah, and Hasadiah, Jushab-Hesed, five.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Hananiah: Pelatiah, and Jesaiah, sons of Rephaiah, sons of Arnan, sons of Obadiah, sons of Shechaniah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Shechaniah: Shemaiah; and sons of Shemaiah: Hattush, and Igeal, and Bariah, and Neariah, and Shaphat, six.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Neariah: Elioenai, and Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Elioenai: Hodaiah, and Eliashib, and Pelaiah, and Akkub, and Johanan, and Delaiah, and Anani, seven.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sons of Judah: Pharez, Hezron, and Carmi, and Hur, and Shobal.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Reaiah son of Shobal begat Jahath, and Jahath begat Ahumai and Lahad; these [are] families of the Zorathite.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these [are] of the father of Etam: Jezreel, and Ishma, and Idbash; and the name of their sister [is] Hazzelelponi,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Penuel [is] father of Gedor, and Ezer father of Hushah. These [are] sons of Hur, first-born of Ephratah, father of Beth-Lehem.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And to Ashhur father of Tekoa were two wives, Helah and Naarah;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Naarah beareth to him Ahuzzam, and Hepher, and Temeni, and Haahashtari: these [are] sons of Naarah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Helah: Zereth, and Zohar, and Ethnan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Coz begat Anub, and Zobebah, and the families of Aharhel son of Harum.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Jabez is honoured above his brethren, and his mother called his name Jabez, saying, `Because I have brought forth with grief.'
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Jabez calleth to the God of Israel, saying, `If blessing Thou dost bless me, then Thou hast made great my border, and Thy hand hath been with me, and Thou hast kept [me] from evil -- not to grieve me;' and God bringeth in that which he asked.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Chelub brother of Shuah begat Mehir; he [is] father of Eshton.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Eshton begat Beth-Rapha, and Paseah, and Tehinnah father of Ir-Nahash; these [are] men of Rechah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Kenaz: Othniel, and Seraiah; and sons of Othniel: Hathath.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Meonothai begat Ophrah, and Seraiah begat Joab father of the valley of artificers, for they were artificers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Caleb son of Jephunneh: Iru, Elah, and Naam; and sons of Elah, even Kenaz.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Jehaleleel: Ziph and Ziphah, Tiria, and Asareel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Ezra [are] Jether, and Mered, and Epher, and Jalon: and she beareth Miriam, and Shammai, and Ishbah father of Eshtemoa.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And his wife Jehudijah bare Jered father of Gedor, and Heber father of Socho, and Jekuthiel father of Zanoah. And these [are] sons of Bithiah daughter of Pharaoh, whom Mered took,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and sons of the wife of Hodiah sister of Nahom: Abi-Keilah the Garmite, and Eshtemoa the Maachathite.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Shimon [are] Amnon, and Rinnah, Ben-Hanon, and Tilon; and sons of Ishi: Zoheth, and Ben-Zoheth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sons of Shelah son of Judah: Er father of Lecah, and Laadah father of Mareshah, and the families of the house of the service of fine linen, of the house of Ashbea;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Jokim, and the men of Chozeba, and Joash, and Saraph, who ruled over Moab and Jashubi-Lehem; and these things [are] ancient.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: They [are] the potters and inhabitants of Netaim and Gedera; with the king in his work they dwelt there.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sons of Simeon: Nemuel, and Jamin, Jarib, Zerah, Shaul;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Shallum his son, Mibsam his son, Mishma his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Mishma: Hammuel his son, Zacchur his son, Shimei his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And to Shimei [are] sixteen sons and six daughters, and to his brethren there are not many sons, and none of their families have multiplied as much as the sons of Judah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they dwell in Beer-Sheba, and Moladah, and Hazar-Shaul,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and in Bilhah, and in Ezem, and in Tolad,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and in Bethuel, and in Hormah, and in Ziklag,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and in Beth-Marcaboth, and in Hazar-Susim, and in Beth-Birei, and in Shaarim; these [are] their cities till the reigning of David.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their villages [are] Etam, and Ain, Rimmon, and Tochen, and Ashan, five cities,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and all their villages that [are] round about these cities unto Baal; these [are] their dwellings, and they have their genealogy:
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: even Meshobab, and Jamlech, and Joshah son of Amaziah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Joel, and Jehu son of Josibiah, son of Seraiah, son of Asiel,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Elioenai, and Jaakobah, and Jeshohaiah, and Asaiah, and Adiel, and Jesimiel, and Benaiah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Ziza son of Shiphi, son of Allon, son of Jedaiah, son of Shimri, son of Shemaiah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These who are coming in by name [are] princes in their families, and the house of their fathers have broken forth into a multitude;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and they go to the entrance of Gedor, unto the east of the valley, to seek pasture for their flock,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and they find pasture, fat and good, and the land broad of sides, and quiet, and safe, for of Ham are those dwelling there before.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these who are written by name come in the days of Hezekiah king of Judah, and smite their tents, and the habitations that have been found there, and devote them to destruction unto this day, and dwell in their stead, because pasture for their flock [is] there.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of them, of the sons of Simeon, there have gone to mount Seir, five hundred men, and Pelatiah, and Neariah, and Rephaiah, and Uzziel, sons of Ishi, at their head,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and they smite the remnant of those escaped of Amalek, and dwell there unto this day.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: As to sons of Reuben, first-born of Israel -- for he [is] the first-born, and on account of his profaning the couch of his father hath his birthright been given to the sons of Joseph son of Israel, and [he is] not to be reckoned by genealogy for the birthright,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: for Judah hath been mighty over his brother, and for leader above him, and the birthright [is] to Joseph.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sons of Reuben, first-born of Israel: Hanoch, and Pallu, Hezron, and Carmi.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sons of Joel: Shemaiah his son, Gog his son, Shimei his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Micah his son, Reaiah his son, Baal his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Beerah his son, whom Tilgath-Pilneser king of Asshur removed; he [is] prince of the Reubenite.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And his brethren, by their families, in the genealogy of their generations, [are] heads: Jeiel, and Zechariah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Bela son of Azaz, son of Shema, son of Joel -- he is dwelling in Aroer, even unto Nebo and Baal-Meon;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and at the east he dwelt even unto the entering in of the wilderness, even from the river Phrat, for their cattle were multiplied in the land of Gilead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And in the days of Saul they have made war with the Hagarites, who fall by their hand, and they dwell in their tents over all the face of the east of Gilead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Gad, over-against them have dwelt in the land of Bashan unto Salcah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Joel the head, and Shapham the second, and Jaanai and Shaphat in Bashan;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and their brethren of the house of their fathers [are] Michael, and Meshullam, and Sheba, and Jorai, and Jachan, and Zia, and Heber, seven.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These [are] sons of Abihail son of Huri, son of Jaroah, son of Gilead, son of Michael, son of Jeshishai, son of Jahdo, son of Buz;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ahi son of Abdiel, son of Guni, [is] head of the house of their fathers;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and they dwell in Gilead in Bashan, and in her small towns, and in all suburbs of Sharon, upon their outskirts;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: all of them reckoned themselves by genealogy in the days of Jotham king of Judah, and in the days of Jeroboam king of Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sons of Reuben, and the Gadite, and the half of the tribe of Manasseh, of sons of valour, men bearing shield and sword, and treading bow, and taught in battle, [are] forty and four thousand and seven hundred and sixty, going out to the host.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they make war with the Hagarites, and Jetur, and Naphish, and Nodab,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and they are helped against them, and the Hagarites are given into their hand, and all who [are] with them, for they cried to God in battle, and He was entreated of them, because they trusted in Him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they take captive their cattle, of their camels fifty thousand, and of sheep two hundred and fifty thousand, and of asses two thousand, and of human beings a hundred thousand;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: for many have fallen pierced, for of God [is] the battle; and they dwell in their stead till the removal.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of the half of the tribe of Manasseh dwelt in the land, from Bashan unto Baal-Hermon, and Senir, and mount Hermon, they have multiplied.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these [are] heads of the house of their fathers, even Epher, and Ishi, and Eliel, and Azriel, and Jeremiah, and Hodaviah, and Jahdiel, men mighty in valour, men of name, heads to the house of their fathers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they trespass against the God of their fathers, and go a-whoring after the gods of the peoples of the land whom God destroyed from their presence;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and stir up doth the God of Israel the spirit of Pul king of Asshur, and the spirit of Tilgath-Pilneser king of Asshur, and he removeth them -- even the Reubenite, and the Gadite, and the half of the tribe of Manasseh -- and bringeth them in to Halah, and Habor, and Hara, and the river of Gozan unto this day.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sons of Levi: Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Kohath; Amram, Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Amram: Aaron, and Moses, and Miriam. And sons of Aaron: Nadab, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Eleazar begat Phinehas, Phinehas begat Abishua,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Abishua begat Bukki, and Bukki begat Uzzi,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Uzzi begat Zerahiah, and Zerahiah begat Meraioth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Meraioth begat Amariah, and Amariah begat Ahitub,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Ahitub begat Zadok, and Zadok begat Ahimaaz,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Ahimaaz begat Azariah, and Azariah begat Johanan,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Johanan begat Azariah, him who acted as priest in the house that Solomon built in Jerusalem.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Azariah begetteth Amariah, and Amariah begat Ahitub,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Ahitub begat Zadok, and Zadok begat Shallum,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Shallum begat Hilkiah, and Hilkiah begat Azariah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Azariah begat Seraiah, and Seraiah begat Jehozadak;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Jehozadak hath gone in Jehovah's removing Judah and Jerusalem by the hand of Nebuchadnezzar.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sons of Levi: Gershom, Kohath, and Merari.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these [are] names of sons of Gershom: Libni and Shimei.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Kohath: Amram, and Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sons of Merari; Mahli and Mushi. And these [are] families of the Levite according to their fathers;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: of Gershom: Libni his son, Jahath his son, Zimmah his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Joah his son, Iddo his son, Zerah his son, Jeaterai his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sons of Kohath: Amminadab his son, Korah his son, Assir his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Elkanah his son, and Ebiasaph his son, and Assir his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Tahath his son, Uriel his son, Uzziah his son, and Shaul his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Elkanah; Amasai and Ahimoth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Elkanah; sons of Elkanah: Zophai his son, and Nahath his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Eliab his son, Jeroham his son, Elkanah his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Samuel: the first-born Vashni, and the second Abijah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sons of Merari: Mahli, Libni his son, Shimei his son, Uzzah his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Shimea his son, Haggiah his son, Asaiah his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these [are] they whom David stationed over the parts of the song of the house of Jehovah, from the resting of the ark,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and they are ministering before the tabernacle of the tent of meeting, in song, till the building by Solomon of the house of Jehovah in Jerusalem; and they stand according to their ordinance over their service.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these [are] those standing, and their sons: of the sons of the Kohathite: Heman the singer, son of Joel, son of Shemuel,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: son of Elkanah, son of Jeroham, son of Eliel, son of Toah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: son of Zuph, son of Elkanah, son of Mahath, son of Amasai,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: son of Elkanah, son of Joel, son of Azariah, son of Zephaniah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: son of Tahath, son of Assir, son of Ebiasaph, son of Korah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: son of Izhar, son of Kohath, son of Levi, son of Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And his brother Asaph, who is standing on his right -- Asaph, son of Berachiah, son of Shimea,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: son of Michael, son of Baaseiah, son of Malchiah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: son of Ethni, son of Zerah, son of Adaiah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: son of Ethan, son of Zimmah, son of Shimei,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: son of Jahath, son of Gershom, son of Levi.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Merari, their brethren, [are] on the left. Ethan son of Kishi, son of Abdi, son of Malluch,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: son of Hashabiah, son of Amaziah, son of Hilkiah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: son of Amzi, son of Bani, son of Shamer,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: son of Mahli, son of Mushi, son of Merari, son of Levi.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their brethren the Levites are put to all the service of the tabernacle of the house of God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Aaron and his sons are making perfume on the altar of the burnt-offering, and on the altar of the perfume, for all the work of the holy of holies, and to make atonement for Israel, according to all that Moses servant of God commanded.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these [are] sons of Aaron: Eleazar his son, Phinehas his son, Abishua his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Bukki his son, Uzzi his son, Zerahiah his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Meraioth his son, Amariah his son, Ahitub his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Zadok his son, Ahimaaz his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these [are] their dwellings, throughout their towers, in their borders, of the sons of Aaron, of the family of the Kohathite, for theirs was the lot;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and they give to them Hebron in the land of Judah and its suburbs round about it;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and the field of the city and its villages they gave to Caleb son of Jephunneh.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And to the sons of Aaron they gave the cities of refuge: Hebron, and Libnah and its suburbs, and Jattir, and Eshtemoa and its suburbs,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Hilen and its suburbs, Debir and its suburbs,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Ashan and its suburbs, and Beth-Shemesh and its suburbs.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And from the tribe of Benjamin, Geba and its suburbs, and Allemeth and its suburbs, and Anathoth and its suburbs. All their cities [are] thirteen cities, for their families.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And to the sons of Kohath, those left of the family of the tribe, from the half of the tribe, the half of Manasseh, by lot, [are] ten cities.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And to the sons of Gershom, for their families, from the tribe of Issachar, and from the tribe of Asher, and from the tribe of Naphtali, and from the tribe of Manasseh in Bashan, thirteen cities.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: To the sons of Merari, for their families, from the tribe of Reuben, and from the tribe of Gad, and from the tribe of Zebulun, by lot, twelve cities.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Israel give to the Levites the cities and their suburbs.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they give by lot from the tribe of the sons of Judah, and from the tribe of the sons of Simeon, and from the tribe of the sons of Benjamin, these cities which they call by name;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and some of the families of the sons of Kohath have cities of their border from the tribe of Ephraim;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and they give to them the cities of refuge, Shechem and its suburbs in the hill-country of Ephraim, and Gezer and its suburbs,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Jokmeam and its suburbs, and Beth-Horan and its suburbs,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Aijalon and its suburbs, and Gath-Rimmon and its suburbs;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and from the half tribe of Manasseh, Aner and its suburbs, and Bileam and its suburbs, for the family of the sons of Kohath who are left.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: To the sons of Gershom from the family of the half of the tribe of Manasseh [are] Golan in Bashan and its suburbs, and Ashtaroth and its suburbs;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and from the tribe of Issachar; Kedesh and its suburbs, Daberath and its suburbs,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Ramoth and its suburbs, and Anem and its suburbs;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and from the tribe of Asher; Mashal and its suburbs, and Abdon and its suburbs,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Hukok and its suburbs, and Rehob and its suburbs;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and from the tribe of Naphtali: Kedesh in Galilee and its suburbs, and Hammon and its suburbs, and Kirjathaim and its suburbs.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: To the sons of Merari who are left, from the tribe of Zebulun, [are] Rimmon and its suburbs, Tabor and its suburbs;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and from beyond the Jordan by Jericho, at the east of the Jordan, from the tribe of Reuben, Bezer in the wilderness and its suburbs, and Jahzah and its suburbs,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Kedemoth and its suburbs, and Mephaath and its suburbs;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and from the tribe of Gad: Ramoth in Gilead and its suburbs, and Mahanaim and its suburbs,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Heshbon and its suburbs, and Jazer and its suburbs.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Issachar; Tola, and Puah, Jashub, and Shimron, four.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Tola: Uzzi, and Rephaiah, and Jeriel, and Jahmai, and Jibsam, and Shemuel, heads of the house of their fathers, [even] of Tola, mighty of valour in their generations: their number in the days of David [is] twenty and two thousand and six hundred.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Uzzi: Izrahiah; and sons of Izrahiah: Michael, and Obadiah, and Joel, Ishiah, Hamishah -- all of them heads.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And beside them, by their generations, of the house of their fathers, [are] troops of the host of battle, thirty and six thousand, for they multiplied wives and sons;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and their brethren of all the families of Issachar [are] mighty of valour, eighty and seven thousand, all have their genealogy.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of Benjamin: Bela, and Becher, and Jediael, three.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Bela: Ezbon, and Uzzi, and Uzziel, and Jerimoth, and Iri, five; heads of a house of fathers, mighty of valour, with their genealogy, twenty and two thousand, and thirty and four.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Becher: Zemirah, and Joash, and Eliezar, and Elioenai, and Omri, and Jerimoth, and Abijah, and Anathoth, and Alameth. All these [are] sons of Becher,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: with their genealogy, after their generations, heads of a house of their fathers, mighty of valour, twenty thousand and two hundred.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Jediael: Bilhan; and sons of Bilhan: Jeush, and Benjamin, and Ehud, and Chenaanah, and Zethan, and Tarshish, and Ahishahar.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: All these [are] sons of Jediael, even heads of the fathers, mighty in valour, seventeen thousand and two hundred going out to the host for battle.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shuppim and Huppim [are] sons of Ir; Hushim son of Aher.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sons of Naphtali: Jahziel, and Guni, and Jezer, and Shallum, sons of Bilhah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sons of Manasseh: Ashriel, whom Jaladah his Aramaean concubine bare, with Machir father of Gilead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Machir took wives for Huppim and for Shuppim, and the name of the one [is] Maachah, and the name of the second Zelophehad, and Zelophehad hath daughters.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Maachah wife of Machir beareth a son and calleth his name Peresh, and the name of his brother [is] Sheresh, and his sons [are] Ulam and Rakem.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And son of Ulam: Bedan. These [are] sons of Gilead son of Machir, son of Manasseh.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And his sister Hammolecheth bare Ishhod, and Abiezer, and Mahalah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Shemida are Ahian, and Shechem, and Likhi, and Aniam.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Ephraim: Shuthelah, and Bered his son, and Tahath his son, and Eladah his son, and Tahath his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Zabad his son, and Shuthelah his son, and Ezer, and Elead; and slain them have men of Gath who are born in the land, because they came down to take their cattle.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ephraim their father mourneth many days, and his brethren come in to comfort him,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and he goeth in unto his wife, and she conceiveth and beareth a son, and he calleth his name Beriah, because in evil had been his house, --
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and his daughter [is] Sherah, and she buildeth Beth-Horon, the lower and the upper, and Uzzen-Sherah --
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Rephah [is] his son, and Resheph, and Telah his son, and Tahan his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Laadan his son, Ammihud his son, Elishama his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Non his son, Jehoshua his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their possession and their dwellings [are] Beth-El and its small towns, and to the east Naaran, and to the west Gezer and its small towns, and Shechem and its small towns, unto Gaza and its small towns;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and by the parts of the sons of Manasseh, Beth-Shean and its small towns, Taanach and its small towns, Megiddo and its small towns, Dor and its small towns; in these dwelt the sons of Joseph son of Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Son of Asher: Imnah, and Ishve, and Ishvi, and Beriah, and Serah their sister.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Beriah: Heber, and Malchiel -- he [is] father of Birzavith.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Heber begat Japhlet, and Shomer, and Hotham, and Shua their sister.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Japhlet: Pasach, and Bimhal, and Ashvath; these [are] sons of Japhlet.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and sons of Shamer: Ahi, and Rohgah, Jehubbah, and Aram.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And son of Helem his brother: Zophah, and Imna, and Shelesh, and Amal.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sons of Zophah: Suah, and Harnepher, and Shual, and Beri, and Imrah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Bezer, and Hod, and Shamma, and Shilshah, and Ithran, and Beera.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Jether: Jephunneh, and Pispah, and Ara.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Ulla: Arah, and Hanniel, and Rezia.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: All these [are] sons of Asher, heads of the house of the fathers, chosen ones, mighty in valour, heads of the princes, with their genealogy, for the host, for battle, their number [is] twenty and six thousand men.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Benjamin begat Bela his first-born, Ashbel the second, and Aharah the third,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And there are sons to Bela: Addar, and Gera,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Abihud, and Abishua, and Naaman, and Ahoah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Gera, and Shephuphan, and Huram.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these [are] sons of Ehud: they are heads of fathers to the inhabitants of Geba, and they remove them unto Manahath;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Naaman, and Ahiah, and Gera, he removed them, and begat Uzza and Ahihud.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shaharaim begat in the field of Moab, after his sending them away; Hushim and Baara [are] his wives.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And he begetteth of Hodesh his wife, Jobab, and Zibia, and Mesha, and Malcham,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Jeuz, and Shachiah, and Mirmah. These [are] his sons, heads of fathers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of Hushim he begat Ahitub and Elpaal.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Elpaal: Eber, and Misheam, and Shamer, (he built Ono and Lod and its small towns),
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Beriah and Shema, (they [are] the heads of fathers to the inhabitants of Aijalon -- they caused to flee the inhabitants of Gath),
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Ahio, Shashak, and Jeremoth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Zebadiah, and Arad, and Ader,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Michael, and Ispah, and Joha, sons of Beriah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hezeki, and Heber,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Ishmerai, and Jezliah, and Jobab, sons of Elpaal;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Jakim, and Zichri, and Zabdi,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Elienai, and Zillethai, and Eliel,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath, sons of Shimei;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ishpan, and Heber, and Eliel,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Abdon, and Zichri, and Hanan,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Hananiah, and Elam, and Antothijah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Iphedeiah, and Penuel, sons of Shashak;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shamsherai, and Shehariah, and Athaliah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Jaareshiah, and Eliah, and Zichri, sons of Jeroham.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These [are] heads of fathers, by their generations, heads; these dwelt in Jerusalem.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And in Gibeon hath the father of Gibeon dwelt, and the name of his wife [is] Maachah;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and his son, the first-born, [is] Abdon, and Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Nadab,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Gedor, and Ahio, and Zacher;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Mikloth begat Shimeah. And they also over-against their brethren dwelt in Jerusalem with their brethren.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ner begat Kish, and Kish begat Saul, and Saul begat Jonathan, and Malchi-Shua, and Abinadab, and Esh-Baal.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And a son of Jonathan [is] Merib-Baal, and Merib-Baal begat Micah;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and sons of Micah: Pithon, and Melech, and Tarea, and Ahaz:
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Ahaz begat Jehoadah, and Jehoadah begat Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begat Moza,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Moza begat Binea, Raphah [is] his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And to Azel [are] six sons, and these [are] their names: Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan. All these [are] sons of Azel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Eshek his brother: Ulam his first-born, Jehush the second, and Eliphelet the third.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Ulam are men mighty in valour, treading bow, and multiplying sons and son's sons, a hundred and fifty. All these [are] of the sons of Benjamin.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And all Israel have reckoned themselves by genealogy, and lo, they are written on the book of the kings of Israel and Judah -- they were removed to Babylon for their trespass.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the first inhabitants, who [are] in their possession, in their cities, of Israel, [are] the priests, the Levites, and the Nethinim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And in Jerusalem dwelt of the sons of Judah, and of the sons of Benjamin, and of the sons of Ephraim and Manasseh:
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Uthai son of Ammihud, son of Omri, son of Imri, son of Bani, of the sons of Pharez, son of Judah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the Shilonite: Asaiah the first-born, and his sons.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the sons of Zerah: Jeuel, and their brethren, six hundred and ninety.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the sons of Benjamin: Sallu son of Meshullam, son of Hodaviah, son of Hassenuah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Ibneiah son of Jeroham, and Elah son of Uzzi, son of Michri, and Meshullam son of Shephatiah, son of Reuel, son of Ibnijah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their brethren, according to their generations, [are] nine hundred and fifty and six. All these [are] men, heads of fathers, according to the house of their fathers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the priests: Jedaiah, and Jehoiarib, and Jachin,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Azariah son of Hilkiah, son of Meshullam, son of Zadok, son of Meraioth, son of Ahitub, leader in the house of God;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Adaiah son of Jeroham, son of Pashhur, son of Malchijah, and Maasai son of Adiel, son of Jahzerah, son of Meshullam, son of Meshillemith, son of Immer.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their brethren, heads to the house of their fathers, a thousand and seven hundred and sixty, mighty in valour, [are] for the work of the service of the house of God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the Levites: Shemaiah son of Hashshub, son of Azrikam, son of Hashabiah, of the sons of Merari;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Bakbakkar, Heresh, and Galal, and Mattaniah son of Micah, son of Zichri, son of Asaph;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Obadiah son of Shemariah, son of Galal, son of Jeduthun, and Berechiah, son of Asa, son of Elkanah, who is dwelling in the villages of the Netophathite.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the gatekeepers [are] Shallum, and Akkub, and Talmon, and Ahiman, and their brethren -- Shallum [is] the head;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and hitherto they [are] at the gate of the king eastward; they [are] the gatekeepers for the companies of the sons of Levi.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shallum son of Kore, son of Ebiasaph, son of Korah, and his brethren, of the house of his father, the Korahites, [are] over the work of the service, keepers of the thresholds of the tent, and their fathers [are] over the camp of Jehovah, keepers of the entrance;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Phinehas son of Eleazar hath been leader over them formerly; Jehovah [is] with him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Zechariah son of Meshelemiah [is] gatekeeper at the opening of the tent of meeting.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: All of those who are chosen for gatekeepers at the thresholds [are] two hundred and twelve; they [are] in their villages, by their genealogy; they whom David and Samuel the seer appointed in their office.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they and their sons [are] over the gates of the house of Jehovah, even of the house of the tent, by watches.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: At four sides are the gatekeepers, east, west, north, and south.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their brethren in their villages [are] to come in for seven days from time to time with these.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For in office [are] the four chiefs of the gatekeepers, they are Levites, and they have been over the chambers, and over the treasuries of the house of God,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and round about the house of God they lodge, for on them [is] the watch, and they [are] over the opening, even morning by morning.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And [some] of them [are] over the vessels of service, for by number they bring them in, and by number they take them out.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And [some] of them are appointed over the vessels, even over all the vessels of the sanctuary, and over the fine flour, and the wine, and the oil, and the frankincense, and the spices.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And [some] of the sons of the priests are mixing the mixture for spices.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Mattithiah, of the Levites (he [is] the first-born to Shallum the Korahite), [is] in office over the work of the pans.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the sons of the Kohathite, [some] of their brethren [are] over the bread of the arrangement, to prepare [it] sabbath by sabbath.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these who sing, heads of fathers of the Levites, in the chambers, [are] free, for by day and by night [they are] over them in the work.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These heads of the fathers of the Levites throughout their generations [are] heads. These have dwelt in Jerusalem.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And in Gibeon dwelt hath the father of Gibeon, Jehiel, and the name of his wife [is] Maachah;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and his son, the first-born, [is] Abdon, and Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Ner, and Nadab,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Gedor, and Ahio, and Zechariah, and Mikloth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Mikloth begat Shimeam, and they also, over-against their brethren, have dwelt in Jerusalem with their brethren.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ner begat Kish, and Kish begat Saul, and Saul begat Jonathan, and Malchi-Shua, and Abinadab, and Esh-Baal.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And a son of Jonathan [is] Merib-Baal, and Merib-Baal begat Micah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And sons of Micah: Pithon, and Melech, and Tahrea,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Ahaz -- he begat Jaarah, and Jaarah begat Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri, and Zimri begat Moza,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Moza begat Binea, and Rephaiah [is] his son. Eleasah his son, Azel his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And to Azel [are] six sons, and these their names: Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan: these [are] sons of Azel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the Philistines have fought with Israel, and the men of Israel flee from the face of the Philistines, and fall wounded in mount Gilboa,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and the Philistines pursue after Saul, and after his sons, and the Philistines smite Jonathan, and Abinadab, and Malchi-Shua, sons of Saul.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the battle [is] heavy on Saul, and those shooting with the bow find him, and he is wounded by those shooting,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Saul saith unto the bearer of his weapons, `Draw thy sword, and pierce me with it, lest these uncircumcised come -- and have abused me.' And the bearer of his weapons hath not been willing, for he feareth exceedingly, and Saul taketh the sword, and falleth upon it;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and the bearer of his weapons seeth that Saul [is] dead, and falleth, he also, on the sword, and dieth;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Saul dieth, and his three sons, and all his house -- together they died.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And all the men of Israel who [are] in the valley see that they have fled, and that Saul and his sons have died, and they forsake their cities and flee, and the Philistines come and dwell in them.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And it cometh to pass, on the morrow, that the Philistines come to strip the wounded, and find Saul and his sons fallen in mount Gilboa,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and strip him, and bear away his head, and his weapons, and send into the land of the Philistines round about to proclaim tidings [to] their idols and the people,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and put his weapons in the house of their gods, and his skull they have fixed in the house of Dagon.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And all Jabesh-Gilead hear of all that the Philistines have done to Saul,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and all the men of valour rise and bear away the body of Saul, and the bodies of his sons, and bring them in to Jabesh, and bury their bones under the oak in Jabesh, and fast seven days.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Saul dieth because of his trespass that he trespassed against Jehovah, against the word of Jehovah that he kept not, and also for asking at a familiar spirit -- to inquire, --
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and he inquired not at Jehovah, and He putteth him to death, and turneth round the kingdom to David son of Jesse.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And gathered are all Israel unto David to Hebron, saying, `Lo, thy bone and thy flesh [are] we;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: even in time past, even in Saul's being king, it is thou who art taking out and bringing in Israel, and Jehovah thy God saith to thee: Thou dost feed My people Israel, and thou art leader over My people Israel.'
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And all the elders of Israel come in unto the king to Hebron, and David maketh with them a covenant in Hebron before Jehovah, and they anoint David for king over Israel, according to the word of Jehovah by the hand of Samuel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David goeth, and all Israel, to Jerusalem -- it [is] Jebus -- and there the Jebusite, the inhabitants of the land.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the inhabitants of Jebus say to David, `Thou dost not come in hither;' and David captureth the fortress of Zion -- it [is] the city of David.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David saith, `Whoever smiteth the Jebusite first doth become head and prince;' and go up first doth Joab son of Zeruiah and becometh head.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David dwelleth in the fortress, therefore they have called it, `City of David;'
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and he buildeth the city round about, from Millo, and unto the circumference, and Joab restoreth the rest of the city.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David goeth, going on and becoming great, and Jehovah of Hosts [is] with him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these [are] heads of the mighty ones whom David hath, who are strengthening themselves with him in his kingdom, with all Israel, to cause him to reign, according to the word of Jehovah, over Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And this [is] an account of the mighty ones whom David hath: Jashobeam son of a Hachmonite [is] head of the thirty; he is lifting up his spear against three hundred -- wounded, at one time.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And after him [is] Eleazar son of Dodo the Ahohite, he [is] among the three mighty;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: he hath been with David in Pas-Dammim, and the Philistines have been gathered there to battle, and a portion of the field is full of barley, and the people have fled from the face of the Philistines,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and they station themselves in the midst of the portion, and deliver it, and smite the Philistines, and Jehovah saveth -- a great salvation.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And three of the thirty heads go down on the rock unto David, unto the cave of Adullam, and the host of the Philistines is encamping in the valley of Rephaim,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and David [is] then in the fortress, and the station of the Philistines [is] then in Beth-Lehem,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and David longeth, and saith, `Who doth give me to drink water from the well of Beth-Lehem, that [is] at the gate!'
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the three break through the camp of the Philistines, and draw water from the well of Beth-Lehem, that [is] at the gate, and bear and bring in unto David, and David hath not been willing to drink it, and poureth it out to Jehovah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and saith, `Far be it from me, by my God, to do this; the blood of these men do I drink with their lives? for with their lives they have brought it;' and he was not willing to drink it; these [things] did the three mighty ones.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Abishai brother of Joab, he hath been head of the three: and he is lifting up his spear against three hundred -- wounded, and hath a name among three.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of the three by the two he is honoured, and becometh their head; and unto the [first] three he hath not come.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Benaiah son of Jehoiada, son of a man of valour, of great deeds, from Kabzeel: he hath smitten the two lion-like Moabites, and he hath gone down and smitten the lion in the midst of the pit, in the day of snow.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And he hath smitten the man, the Egyptian -- a man of measure, five by the cubit -- and in the hand of the Egyptian [is] a spear like a beam of weavers, and he goeth down unto him with a rod, and taketh violently away the spear out of the hand of the Egyptian, and slayeth him with his own spear.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These [things] hath Benaiah son of Jehoiada done, and hath a name among the three mighty ones.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of the thirty, lo, he [is] honoured, and unto the [first] three he hath not come, and David setteth him over his guard.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the mighty ones of the forces [are] Asahel brother of Joab, Elhanan son of Dodo of Beth-Lehem,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Shammoth the Harorite, Helez the Pelonite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ira son of Ikkesh the Tekoite, Abi-Ezer the Annethothite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sibbecai the Hushathite, Ilai the Ahohite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Maharai the Netophathite, Heled son of Baanah the Netophathite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ithai son of Ribai of Gibeah, of the sons of Benjamin, Benaiah the Pirathonite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Hurai of the brooks of Gaash, Abiel the Arbathite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Azmaveth the Baharumite, Eliahba the Shaalbonite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the sons of Hashem the Gizonite, Jonathan son of Shage the Hararite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ahiam son of Sacar the Hararite, Eliphal son of Ur,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Hepher the Mecherathite, Ahijah the Pelonite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Hezor the Carmelite, Naarai son of Ezbai,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Joel brother of Nathan, Mibhar son of Haggeri,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Zelek the Ammonite, Naharai the Berothite, bearer of the weapons of Joab son of Zeruiah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ira the Ithrite, Gareb the Ithrite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Uriah the Hittite, Zabad son of Ahlai,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Adina son of Shiza the Reubenite, head of the Reubenites, and by him thirty,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Hanan son of Maachah, and Joshaphat the Mithnite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Uzzia the Ashterathite, Shama and Jehiel sons of Hothan the Aroerite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Jediael son of Shimri, and Joha his brother the Tizite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Eliel the Mahavite, and Jeribai, and Joshaviah, sons of Elnaam, and Ithmah the Moabite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Eliel, and Obed, and Jaasiel the Mesobaite.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these [are] those coming in unto David to Ziklag, while shut up because of Saul son of Kish, and they [are] among the mighty ones, helping the battle,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: armed with bow, right and left handed, with stones, and with arrows, with bows, of the brethren of Saul, of Benjamin.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The head [is] Ahiezer, and Joash, sons of Shemaab the Gibeathite, and Jeziel, and Pelet, sons of Azmaveth, and Berachah, and Jehu the Antothite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Ishmaiah the Gibeonite, a mighty one among the thirty, and over the thirty, and Jeremiah, and Jahaziel, and Johanan, and Josabad the Gederathite.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Eluzai, and Jerimoth, and Bealiah, and Shemariah, and Shephatiah the Haruphite;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Elkanah, and Jesiah, and Azareel, and Joezer, and Jashobeam the Korhites,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Joelah, and Zebadiah, sons of Jeroham of Gedor.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the Gadite there have been separated unto David, to the fortress, to the wilderness, mighty of valour, men of the host for battle, setting in array target and buckler, and their faces the face of the lion, and as roes on the mountains for speed:
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ezer the head, Obadiah the second, Eliab the third,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Mishmannah the fourth, Jeremiah the fifth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Attai the sixth, Eliel the seventh,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Johanan the eighth, Elzabad the ninth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Jeremiah the tenth, Machbannai the eleventh.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These [are] of the sons of Gad, heads of the host, one of a hundred [is] the least, and the greatest, of a thousand;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: these [are] they who have passed over the Jordan in the first month, -- and it is full over all its banks -- and cause all [they of] the valley to flee to the east and to the west.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And there come of the sons of Benjamin and Judah unto the stronghold to David,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and David goeth out before them, and answereth and saith to them, `If for peace ye have come in unto me, to help me, I have a heart to unite with you; and if to betray me to mine adversaries -- without violence in my hands -- the God of our fathers doth see and reprove.'
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the Spirit hath clothed Amasai, head of the captains: `To thee, O David, and with thee, O son of Jesse -- peace! peace to thee, and peace to thy helper, for thy God hath helped thee;' and David receiveth them, and putteth them among the heads of the troop.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of Manasseh there have fallen unto David in his coming with the Philistines against Israel to battle -- and they helped them not, for by counsel the princes of the Philistines sent him away, saying, `With our heads he doth fall unto his master Saul.' --
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: In his going unto Ziglag there have fallen unto him of Manasseh, Adnah, and Jozabad, and Jediael, and Michael, and Jozabad, and Elihu, and Zillthai, heads of the thousands that [are] of Manasseh;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and they have helped with David over the troop, for mighty of valour [are] all of them, and they are captains in the host,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: for at that time, day by day, they come in unto David to help him, till it is a great camp, like a camp of God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these [are] the numbers of the head, of the armed men of the host; they have come in unto David to Hebron to turn round the kingdom of Saul unto him, according to the mouth of Jehovah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Judah, bearing target and spear, [are] six thousand and eight hundred, armed ones of the host.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of the sons of Simeon, mighty ones of valour for the host, [are] seven thousand and a hundred.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of the sons of Levi [are] four thousand and six hundred;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Jehoiada [is] the leader of the Aaronite, and with him [are] three thousand and seven hundred,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Zadok, a young man, mighty of valour, and of the house of his father [are] twenty and two heads.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the sons of Benjamin, brethren of Saul, [are] three thousand, and hitherto their greater part are keeping the charge of the house of Saul.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the sons of Ephraim [are] twenty thousand and eight hundred, mighty of valour, men of name, according to the house of their fathers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the half of the tribe of Manasseh [are] eighteen thousand, who have been defined by name, to come in to cause David to reign.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the sons of Issachar, having understanding for the times, to know what Israel should do; their heads [are] two hundred, and all their brethren [are] at their command.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of Zebulun, going forth to the host, arranging battle with all instruments of battle, [are] fifty thousand, and keeping rank without a double heart.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of Naphtali, a thousand heads, and with them, with target and spear, [are] thirty and seven thousand.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the Danite, arranging battle, [are] twenty and eight thousand and six hundred.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of Asher, going forth to the host, to arrange battle, [are] forty thousand.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And from beyond the Jordan, of the Reubenite, and of the Gadite, and of the half of the tribe of Manasseh, with all instruments of the host for battle, [are] a hundred and twenty thousand.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: All these [are] men of war, keeping rank -- with a perfect heart they have come to Hebron, to cause David to reign over all Israel, and also all the rest of Israel [are] of one heart, to cause David to reign,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and they are there, with David, three days, eating and drinking, for their brethren have prepared for them.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And also those near unto them, unto Issachar, and Zebulun, and Naphtali, are bringing in bread on asses, and on camels, and on mules, and on oxen -- food of fine flour, fig-cakes and grape-cakes, and wine, and oil, and oxen, and sheep, in abundance, for joy [is] in Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David consulteth with the heads of the thousands, and of the hundreds, every leader,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and David saith to all the assembly of Israel, `If unto you it be good, and from Jehovah our God it hath broken forth -- we send unto our brethren, those left in all the lands of Israel, and with them the priests and the Levites, in the cities of their suburbs, and they are gathered unto us,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and we bring round the ark of our God unto us, for we sought Him not in the days of Saul.'
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And all the assembly say to do so, for the thing is right in the eyes of all the people.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David assembleth all Israel from Shihor of Egypt even unto the entering in of Hamath, to bring in the ark of God from Kirjath-Jearim,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and David goeth up, and all Israel, to Baalah, unto Kirjath-Jearim that [is] to Judah, to bring up thence the ark of God Jehovah, inhabiting the cherubs, where the Name is called on.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they place the ark of God on a new cart, from the house of Abinadab, and Uzza and Ahio are leading the cart,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and David and all Israel are playing before God, with all strength, and with songs, and with harps, and with psalteries, and with timbrels, and with cymbals, and with trumpets.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they come in unto the threshing-floor of Chidon, and Uzza putteth forth his hand to seize the ark, for the oxen were released,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and the anger of Jehovah is kindled against Uzza, and He smiteth him, because that he hath put forth his hand on the ark, and he dieth there before God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And it is displeasing to David, because Jehovah hath made a breach upon Uzza, and one calleth that place `Breach of Uzza' unto this day.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David feareth God on that day, saying, `How do I bring in unto me the ark of God?'
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David hath not turned aside the ark unto himself, unto the city of David, and turneth it aside unto the house of Obed-Edom the Gittite.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the ark of God dwelleth with the household of Obed-Edom, in his house, three months, and Jehovah blesseth the house of Obed-Edom, and all that he hath.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Huram king of Tyre sendeth messengers unto David, and cedar-wood, and artificers of walls, and artificers of wood, to build to him a house.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David knoweth that Jehovah hath established him for king over Israel, because of the lifting up on high of his kingdom, for the sake of His people Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David taketh again wives in Jerusalem, and David begetteth again sons and daughters;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and these [are] the names of the children whom he hath in Jerusalem: Shammua, and Shobab, Nathan, and Solomon,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Ibhar, and Elishua, and Elpalet,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Elishama, and Beeliada, and Eliphalet.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the Philistines hear that David hath been anointed for king over all Israel, and all the Philistines go up to seek David, and David heareth, and goeth out before them.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the Philistines have come, and rush into the valley of Rephaim,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and David asketh of God, saying, `Do I go up against the Philistines -- and hast Thou given them into my hand?' And Jehovah saith to him, `Go up, and I have given them into thy hand.'
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they go up into Baal-Perazim, and David smiteth them there, and David saith, `God hath broken up mine enemies by my hand, like the breaking up of waters;' therefore they have called the name of that place Baal-Perazim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they leave there their gods, and David speaketh, and they are burnt with fire.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the Philistines add again, and rush into the valley,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and David asketh again of God, and God saith to him, `Do not go up after them, turn round from them, and thou hast come to them from over-against the mulberries;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and it cometh to pass, when thou hearest the sound of the stepping at the heads of the mulberries, then thou goest out into battle, for God hath gone out before thee to smite the camp of the Philistines.'
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David doth as God commanded him, and they smite the camp of the Philistines from Gibeon even unto Gazer;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and the name of David goeth out into all the lands, and Jehovah hath put his fear on all the nations.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And he maketh for himself houses in the city of David, and prepareth a place for the ark of God, and stretcheth out for it a tent.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then said David, `None [are] to carry the ark of God, except the Levites, for on them hath Jehovah fixed to carry the ark of God, and to serve Him -- unto the age.'
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David assembleth all Israel unto Jerusalem, to bring up the ark of Jehovah unto its place that he had prepared for it.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David gathereth the sons of Aaron, and the Levites.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of sons of Kohath: Uriel the chief, and his brethren, a hundred and twenty.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of sons of Merari: Asaiah the chief, and his brethren, two hundred and twenty.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of sons of Gershom: Joel the chief, and his brethren, a hundred and thirty.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of sons of Elizaphan: Shemaiah the chief, and his brethren, two hundred.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of sons of Hebron: Eliel the chief, and his brethren, eighty.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of sons of Uzziel: Amminadab the chief, and his brethren, a hundred and twelve.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David calleth to Zadok and to Abiathar the priests, and to the Levites, to Uriel, Asaiah, and Joel, Shemaiah, and Eliel, and Amminadab,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and saith to them, `Ye [are] heads of the fathers of the Levites; sanctify yourselves, ye and your brethren, and ye have brought up the ark of Jehovah, God of Israel, unto [the place] I have prepared for it;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: because at the first [it was] not ye, Jehovah our God made a breach upon us, because we sought Him not according to the ordinance.'
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the priests and the Levites sanctify themselves, to bring up the ark of Jehovah, God of Israel;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and sons of the Levites bear the ark of God, as Moses commanded, according to the word of Jehovah, on their shoulder, with staves, above them.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David saith to the heads of the Levites to appoint their brethren the singers, with instruments of song, psalteries, and harps, and cymbals, sounding, to lift up with the voice for joy.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the Levites appoint Heman son of Joel, and of his brethren, Asaph son of Berechiah, and of the sons of Merari their brethren, Ethan son of Kushaiah;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and with them their brethren, the seconds [in rank], Zechariah, Ben, and Jaaziel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Unni, Eliab, and Benaiah, and Maaseiah, and Mattithiah, and Elipheleh, and Mikneiah; and Obed-Edom and Jeiel the gatekeepers;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and the singers, Heman, Asaph, and Ethan, with cymbals of brass to sound,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Zechariah, and Aziel, and Shemiramoth, and Jeheil, and Unni, and Eliab, and Maaseiah, and Benaiah, with psalteries besides virgins,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Mattithiah, and Elipheleh, and Mikneiah, and Obed-Edom, and Jeiel, and Azaziah, with harps, on the octave, to oversee.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Chenaniah, head of the Levites, [is] over the burden; he instructeth about the burden, for he [is] intelligent.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Berechiah and Elkanah [are] gatekeepers for the ark.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shebaniah, and Joshaphat, and Nethaneel, and Amasai, and Zechariah, and Benaiah, and Eliezer the priests, are blowing with trumpets before the ark of God; and Obed-Edom and Jehiah [are] gatekeepers for the ark.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And it is David, and the elders of Israel, and the heads of the thousands, who are going to bring up the ark of the covenant of Jehovah from the house of Obed-Edom with joy;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and it cometh to pass, in God's helping the Levites bearing the ark of the covenant of Jehovah, that they sacrifice seven bullocks and seven rams.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David is wrapped in an upper robe of fine linen, and all the Levites who are bearing the ark, and the singers, and Chenaniah head of the burden of the singers; and on David [is] an Ephod of linen.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And all Israel are bringing up the ark of the covenant of Jehovah with shouting, and with the sound of a cornet, and with trumpets, and with cymbals, sounding with psalteries and harps,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and it cometh to pass, the ark of the covenant of Jehovah is entering in unto the city of David, and Michal daughter of Saul is looking through the window, and seeth king David dancing and playing, and despiseth him in her heart.
verses.speaker: Narrator
